tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE public_procurement_processes (
    process_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    process_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    start_date DATE NOT NULL,
    end_date DATE,
    bidder_count INT
)

CREATE TABLE contracts (
    contract_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    contract_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    vendor_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    contract_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE procurement_processes (
  process_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  process_name TEXT NOT NULL,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  department_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE contracts (
  contract_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  procurement_process_id INT,
  vendor_name TEXT NOT NULL,
  contract_amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  signing_date DATE,
  expiration_date DATE,
  CONSTRAINT fk_procurement_process FOREIGN KEY (procurement_process_id) REFERENCES procurement_processes(process_id)
);

CREATE TABLE public_procurement_processes (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  process_name VARCHAR(255),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE contracts (
  contract_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  contractor_name VARCHAR(255),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  total_amount DECIMAL,
  status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE procurement_documentation (
  doc_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  doc_name VARCHAR(255),
  doc_type VARCHAR(50),
  created_date DATE,
  uploaded_by VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE bids (
  bid_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  contract_id INT REFERENCES contracts(contract_id),
  company_name VARCHAR(255),
  bid_amount DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE contracts (
  contract_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  department_id INT REFERENCES departments(department_id),
  vendor_id INT REFERENCES vendors(vendor_id),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE departments (
  department_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  department_name VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE vendors (
  vendor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  vendor_name VARCHAR(255),
  address VARCHAR(255),
  contact_person VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE procurement_processes (
  process_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  department_id INT REFERENCES departments(department_id),
  status VARCHAR(50),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE
)
